productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love my tap. It sounds great and is so easy to use.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have missed my Pandora since I moved from Ft. Worth, TX to Colorado a few months ago. My nephew had the Amazon Tap and I was amazed at all the things his kids were having fun with it ( saying.. ALEXA.. tell MIMI (their Grandmother) to GO TO BED.. AND IT DID!! And the sound and quality of music coming from it. Awesome. :) I had to have one, so I went to local Best Buy and bought it. I even set it up myself (I'm 65 so was impressed with myself! LOL) but I have listened nonstop to 60s music or music from DIRTY DANCING (which I loved). I have ordered a little case from Amazon.com to keep it if it tips over or just to carry from room to room, which I have been doing. I feel like I have a new found friend.... love listening to this little cylinder who is as good as BOSE in my book! Get it, you'll love it! I DO!! :) VERY VERY pleased with it! Weather updates here or where my kdis are. Just checking. :)No interruptions or commercials when listening ALL DAY LONG!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Best Buy was running a sale on these and I thought I'd give it a try. I wasn't expecting much but was pleasantly surprised. I'm an Apple guy so Siri has been my "go to" virtual assistant. I must say that I am duly impressed with Alexa. She seems to understand me better than Siri does. All the Skills and the ability to play music by just asking is really great!The fact that this is all available in a portable device that I can take with me everywhere I go is so useful. The Tap remembers both wifi and cellular hotspot connections so I can use it anywhere. Unlike its non-portable brother the Echo, you push a button to issue commands to Alexa. On the plus side, you don't have to say Alexa. On the negative side you still have to push the button. I understand why this has to be the case as it would not last long on battery power if Alexa was listening all the time. Amazon should issue a firmware update to allow Alexa to listen all the time when plugged in.The sound quality is good, not great. Other speakers in the $129 category sound better. But none have all the convenience of Alexa, Bluetooth, Wifi and portability in one package.I'll be buying more as Christmas gifts!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: When I purchased the Tap I thought it was a portable speaker for the echo. It's actually it's own device. Yes, it's portable, can operate wireless.It does work with the same "alexa" set up. The Echo operates with no handsyou can simply speak to Alexa. The tap has a microphone button you need to hold down to speak to Alexa. Great sound quality. Rechargeable base unit.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: When I purchased the Tap I thought it was a portable speaker for the echo. It's actually it's own device. Yes, it's portable, can operate wireless.It does work with the same "alexa" set up. The Echo operates with no handsyou can simply speak to Alexa. The tap has a microphone button you need to hold down to speak to Alexa. Great sound quality. Rechargeable base unit.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love my new toy. Alexa is my personal girl Friday. She understands what I want and retrieves it. Easy to set up and use.

But you have to be aware that most features require to some degree Amazon Prime membership. For example Spotify will not work unless it is a premium account.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I was an early adoptor of the Amazon Echo, when I heard they were releasing a mobile version I wanted it. It wasn't until we spent a lot of time cleaning our old home before moving that we realized how usefule this lil guy was, just set it up to your phones wifi hotspot and you have a fully function Echo. I would buy this again if I didn't already have one.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The Amazon Echo Tap is a nice & interesting device...but it did not fit my needs. I also have the Amazon Echo and absolutely love it. So what's the difference? A. You have to walk up the the Tap to touch it - this is not as convenient and not as fun as the talking to the Echo from across the room. B. The audio quality not very good - more like a small bluetooth speaker. C. The Tap is fine around the house when it's connected to the home wi-fi, but when you are out of the house it must connect to your cell phone or other wi-fi?? That is not going to work very well.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Seriously a flawless, portable, smart, multipurpose gadget. Add this to the incredible Flash Sale price and I'd have been a fool to pass it up. Fast charge, balanced tuning, easy to pair and did I mention highly portable? The cradle is a sweet design too. The only beef I have is that YOUR BLUETOOTH IS PAIRED screaming at you when syncing. Own one of these-

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This device can be a very load speaker, I mean really LOUD. It also can access AMAZON prime service without a computer. I like this little Tap.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Omg I am so enjoying this. Sitting around the back deck with family wishing we have music that doesn't require plugs or wires. Saw it online deals of the day read the reviews and ordered on he spot and drove a half hour drive to my closet Best Buy. Play it now everyday.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: As a bluetooth speaker, the Tap rocks! The sound quality is excellent, plenty loud when needed, and excellent quality with no stutters in streaming. I bought this one instead of the Echo because it is portable, and I can lug it from room to room. The charging stand is very convenient, and the Tap stays there most of the time. Having to press the button to activate each of the voice commands is not an issue for me, but is something to consider. (If you want hands free use, you may want the big brother Echo device, which is hands free, but tethered in place by a power cord, so not portable). The feel of the Tap with the black fabric cover is nice, and will not slip out of your hand. The fabric is like tough upholstery cover, so it won't stain or be easy to damage, but is quite attractive. I am glad they did that, as bare plastic would be easy to drop. I found it easy to pair with bluetooth and wireless, and it works as advertised! I mostly just use it for playing music and asking Alexa silly questions for fun! I occasionally use it for shopping lists, which shows up on my phone, and checking the weather. Who knows what the future holds,when I have time to sit down and really learn all that it can do? I understand that Amazon plans to add more Alexa skills all the time, and if one got into smart house control with compatible products, the Tap would eliminate all remotes, which I already have too many of. I think it is a really fun, cool item, and I am glad I got it! It is so much fun to use voice commands instead of typing, especially the tiny smart phone typing ! I could get used to this! I have the Alexa app on my phone, which allows certain voice commands to show up on my phone, like shopping lists, to do lists, calendar. The Tap can also check traffic, weather, movies, etc directly through Wi Fi, no phone needed. However, the Alexa phone app actually helps you figure out what you can do with the Tap. The Tap can read Audible and some kindle ebooks to you as well! BTW, I haven't had any problems having it understand me, which is amazing, since I grew up in Texas and expected a problem with my accent. Obviously, this item is ideal for people who are Amazon Prime members, so you can stream Prime Music, although it also streams Pandora and other music services, and does many things without any connection to Amazon. I guess the most unique thing about the Tap is its ability to stream wi fi music directly, without a computer or phone driving it - that and the voice control. I have paid more for smaller "just" bluetooth speakers, so to me, this was a super deal, and continues to be a source of fun and entertainment!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I like how it plays music. It is perfect to connect to smart home products. Such as nest, Belkin , and many others. It is easy to use.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: For the price, you should be able to use as a speaker when talking on the phone. I had to use my daughter's Beats Pill for this function, therefore it's not worth all the hype.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It is great to take my Tap on the road. Easy to use and sounds great.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This has all the benefits of the Echo for a slightly better price. I also love the portability.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Good price works great would buy again good value for the price

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It's pretty good for what it is designed to do: a portable bluetooth speaker and Alexa-enabled speaker. Not voice controlled so you have to touch the speaker button for Alexa. Nice thing once connected to your Alexa account is that you can play music, whatever, without having your phone nearby though Alexa only works when connected to WiFi. If no Wifi, then connect via bluetooth to play music from any apps. Battery life is also pretty good.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great concept but speaker not so good at full volume. And maybe better now with the updates

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: bought as a gift for my daughter. actually sounds better and easier to set up than expected. the personal assistant feature is really amazing, instant response to requests for information and music.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: For its size this is a pretty well made product that produces great sound and I love the portability.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Bought the echo first, and liked it so much I bought a Tap to add mobility. I carry it around all the time, to the garage, working out, etc.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Bought this for my boyfriend, he LOVES it! He takes it on every trip we go on. It's so powerful for such a small speaker! I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The kids love it. They ask it silly questions which to my amazement it has an answer. I really like for the music aspect. Just tell it a song and it finds it

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The product it amazing love that it turns in lights on and plays my favorite music.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It's very easy to connect devices, and it produces a good sound. I'm very pleased with this purchase.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is a good alternative to the amazon echo. I like that supposedly it's not listening all the time and you have to hit the button to talk to Alexa but at the same time you have to hit the button to talk to Alexa.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It is a quality product and has clear crisp sound. Best part it can be carried in any satchel. Sound is loud enough for a back yard gathering.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I really haven't had a chance to use this much yet, but it seems like a coll little gadget.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Tap is a versatile device that serves as a music repository with on demand playback features and surprisingly high quality sound. AI app Alexa responds to commands and requests for information promptly with some occasional minor glitches. Overall a handy and very portable device for quality music playback and as a knowledge base access tool,

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Gave as a gift.Did not know you had to "tap" it before you talk. Thought it was like echo.Anyway, they still love it and does not mind pushing the button to talk.Really likes that it is battery powered, portable.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Don't know how I managed without Alexa. Everyone in the family is enjoying her.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: If you have Prime this is the best thing you can buy!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Got this on sale for 100! Replaces my 500 cds! Must buy as long as you have Prime!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Overall for an Alexa product it does the same thing as all the other ones. This one is specifically portable and only needs to be put on the base for charging. The one main issue is that it is not voice activated (meaning it does not listen to you unless you press any of the buttons on top or the mic button in front. By having this feature, I could see it causing excess battery usage. Needs to be able to apps better.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Love Alexa. We currently have three devices that we use on a daily basis. I use one at work basically for streaming music. Great device. No problems connecting to any of them.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is a great product! Would definitely recommend this item!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I ordered this and actually came in earlier than predicted and it works beautiful! I'm totally happy with my purchase!!!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have the have the Echo and this portable speaker is a great addition to my automated home. Especially if I'm working in the garage and want to listen to music

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have an Alexa but wanted a speaker for traveling. You can use this without a plug in cord.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: i got one for my mom she's 90 years young and she sits and listens to it all day, she;s got the amazon tap i got my draugther the dot and i got my self another tap. i just found out you can put the tap on hands free and you dont have to tap the button this made it even better. my grand kids love playing ganes with alexa. like i said every household need one

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love it hut I think I should have got the bigger one, but its entertaining

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Bought this gift for my wife and she loves it. Works as expected.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I bought this speaker after looking at other speakers from Bose and Beats. I purchased this one because it had great sound, but also because it was cheaper than competitors and had many additional capabilities via Alexa voice control. I love the ability to walk around the house and use streaming services via voice. It's great than I can carry just the speaker and not have to rely upon a phone app to change songs, playlists, volume, etc. The Alexa voice recognition works very well--it seems to be more accurate than Siri. I frequently ask Alexa what song is playing. I also ask Alexa to search for certain songs that I want to hear. If not in my library, it will play from Prime Music, similar to the way Apple Music functions. Additional voice features I use are news reports, weather forecasts, and control of WeMo switches in my home. Overall a great buy.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The tap is a great product! Access to Alexa in a grab and go format!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Truly amazing combination of portability and ease of use and good sound.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Love every aspect of the Echo. We even went and bought a Tap!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Reasonably priced and worth every penny! I love it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Amazon is the tip of leading technology. Always have had great luck with their product.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Looked at the Echo before we bought this and I would have been a fool to buy it when you have to add a battery to make it portable. This has everything we need and then some.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great Speaker but I really don't need the features. I just need good sound and don't really use anything besides that

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love my Amazon Tap. I was in the market for a portable speaker and I saw these one on sale so I decided to pick it up. I only wanted it for a Bluetooth speaker, but Alexa is amazing I use it everyday. Alexa was a huge plus.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is a awesome product. My husband and I love it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Was gift fot my daughter. she seems to enjoy very much.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: What a terrific device. You can ask it anything and she has an answer. It's small enough to place anywhere so it doesn't look instructive

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: So glad I purchased this productive it use it all the time

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Amazon Tap is exactly what I expected it would be. The sound quality is good with the Alexa features. I love that you can charge it on the base or with micro USB cord. I would recommend it to anyone that is interested in Amazon Echo and would like the portability.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Love the Dot, Hate the Tap Portable! This device will not hold a charge for even one day. The dots are amazing though.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Definitely enjoy using this at home. I was surprised at how intuitive it is and was able to answer any question in seconds. I mostly use it to play music through Amazon player. I know there's tons more it can do and can't wait to take advantage of all its capabilities.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Purchased this as a gift for a teenage kid as a graduation present. Very pleased with the purchase. The kids love it. Small size, but good speakers. Perfect for the college dorms where he is scheduled to go in a couple of months. Love how the device connects to the cloud and keeps itself updated.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: the speaker voice quality is terrible compare the similar size my logitech UE BOOM.the price is too high, even I got on promotion with $79

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I already own the Amazon Echo, so for smart speaker, it is one of the most handy devices out there. There is so many things you will find that you can do with it and the list keeps growing. Since the software update that allows you to use "Always On" voice commands like its big brother, it has become my go to device.Pros:- Wireless Bluetooth Smart Speaker - I take it to work and use it in the car, even when I travel for work- Sync's up with my popular music aps (Spotify, Pandora, etc)- Alexa is very responsive and can answer your questions quickly- The best Alarm Clock- I sync up with audio books and will use it on long car rides or business trips- Speaker is able to get loud- Control smart devices like lighting and my ecobee - Option to turn Off/On voice commands, can use tap button instead- Very long range for voice commandsCons:- Only single band Wi-Fi 2.4Ghz- Battery life when using "Always On" voice commands is short- Speaker quality is sub par for music compared to other Bluetooth speakersOverall the usefulness of this device is near perfect for my needs, with only minimal cons. I use this device pretty much every day and is small enough to make for an excellent travel companion.Tip for BESTBUY: You should carry cases for this device as I had to get my protector elsewhere

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Smaller version but works great just like the bigger product.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It works about 50% of the time when asking it a question.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We really enjoy our Alexa. I always have it for music. Lately we been movie times. The kids like to ask it silly questions and they can't get enough of it

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Love this product. It is nice looking, easy to carry, and the sound is amazing. Very easy to set up and connect to amazon echo. Nothing to complain about th he speaker itself. However the carrying case is kind of stupid and useless also. One has to take it down just in order to charge.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Much better than the echo dot. However, the fact that you have to touch the button to activate it instead of just talking to it is a bit annoying. Speaker is fairly powerful for its size.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is a nice item..I can set reminders get news and weather..all by the tap of a button

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Guys, the Tap does everything Echo does and it's portable! Use it at home for everything, at work on your desk for music, weather, etc, and even poolside as a portable speaker.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This Alexa is a super form of info with little wait time.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I liked it as it was a great price and the size was the major factor... Not too big and bulky compared to others.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It's so fantastic to just ask a device to turn on lights, or play music. So convenient. Love this!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Smart, timely, very effective around the house. I have a Dot as well but the Tap has MUCH better sound. I had a Google Earth and replaced it with the TAP because Google was not as smart as Tappy!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have a regular echo and now the tap. Both awesome products, use them to control lights, locks, and play music. Would buy again.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Was excited to get this product for its sheer portability alone (doesn't need to be plugged into an electrical outlet all the time like we have to do with our Echo Dot), but was pleasantly surprised with the sound quality and volume! We prefer this over our outdoor bluetooth speaker, and its "Hands-Free" mode is a great updated feature (though we try not to keep it on that setting too long because it does drain the battery faster)...

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great product at a great price from Best Buy. Have to press a button rather than just saying her name, but that's the price you pay for it being cordless.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Anyone needing a compact and easily mobile speaker should look at this. The sound quality is excellent, it is easy to sync via Bluetooth and gives you the ability to stream music when connected to wifi. Great product for the price and perfect for the office.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Lets me choose the type of music I love. Can even go to the beach with me using my sling.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: There's a lot of features and we are just getting started with Tap. Glad we made the purchase!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It's a nice item but really there's other things that do the same thing. So we actually returned it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great speaker, Love using voice commands, Even my granddaughters use the voice command to search for songs.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have not had such a reliable speaker before. It is so easy to charge, and so easy to start playing songs right away. With Alexa, you can access information quicker than pulling out your phone, unlocking it, and pulling up Google.com. Love it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I bought this about a month ago and I really like it. The best part is light in weight, sound is very good for small gathering like on the deck or camping and it comes with Batterey charger. The voice command activation is so great to have and listen all my music plus worldwide radios from TuneIn.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I really liked this tablet. Got it for my nephew who just turned 4. Has many built in kid rated apps which keeps him entertained. The bumper is a bonus in case he drops it too. What I also like is that it had another mode to switch to in case an adult wanted to use it too.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Use is all the time. Backyard favorite. Great by the fire.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Doesn't understand some commands or Questions,but good overall

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: A nice complement to the Alexa family. The sound quality is nearly as good as the original Echo, and the voice activation addition makes it an even better by, particularly for the price.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Amazon tap is one of my best buys this year so far...The only thing that could make the tap better is an upgrade so you don't have to tap every command....That would make it a 5star device....

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I absolutely LOVE my Amazon TAP. It in my opinion is the best blue-tooth speaker around and with the added skills when on wifi, the TAP is better than the Echo! Portable - YES! Sound Quality - OFF THE CHARTS! I blue-tooth this to my computer and listen to movies with GREAT Dolby sound quality. The battery life has been tested during a camping trip. 8 hours and it kept the charge! It's also easy to recharge it without the stand. Very Cool. BEST BUY's PRICE made it ALL THE BEST BUY OF THE CHRISTMAS SEASON! I picked up the item same day at a local Best Buy. The Experience was 1 - 2 - DONE. Very convenient, very helpful. I would recommend this to ALL my friends!!!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Alexa do ........something? Welcome to the new interconnected world Circlers! Do you want a speaker to stream your music at a voice command? This may be for you! Do you feel that technology is driving our lives more and more toward the dystopia of David Eggers "The Circle" and you want to escape from technology for a while? Then likely not, as even though you have to touch the button on this unit as opposed to the always on Echo and Echo Dots, your life is still connected to Alexa via voice prompts! I liked using it for Amazon music, and the occasional Amazon Video, but i have yet to order a pizza or hail an Uber. Some people may feel they need technology to run their lives, I am not quite there yet and may never be! It is fun for what it does though, and it is a good bluetooth speaker!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Once the tap was able to be activated by voice I started to have some interest. Having said that I notice I do use the 'Tap' button when I have it in my hand. We use it mostly outside and by our hot tub. Took is on vacation this last week and use it at the beach using cell phone as an access point.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Didn't know I would like it this much, but it's wonderful. I use it mostly for streaming music from Pandora. I love that I don't have to rely on another device and connect via bluetooth like other speakers and the sound it great!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I wanted a speaker to listen to Pandora and go so much more! Being able to speak to Alexa and get news, weather, timer, light controls and so much more! Love the product!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great speaker and the sound is great. Use it every day. Love being able to use Alexa when attached to my network.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have a few top end Bluetooth speakers and this Amazon tap rates right up with them in sound and built quality plus it has alexa built in

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Bought the Tap for my mom to primarily listen to music. Although my mom forgets "the girl's name" haha, we've found Alexa will answer without saying her name. The rechargeable base is nice so the Tap can be moved around the house or outside within range of wifi. Sound is great, too! Pleased!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I gave this to my daughter for Christmas because she wanted a portable speaker. I thought the addition of Alexa would be fun. She loves it. She said the sound is really great.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: If you are a Prime member its a good little speaker to have. Need WIFI or Hotspot.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Nice portable speaker but wish the sound quality was better.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: More than you average portable bluetooth speaker. Can stream from amazon, spotify, pandora, etc. As the namesake says, give it a tap to ask Alexa any questions, add to your list, order something on Amazon, etc.Battery life is good, and speaker is decent, but can't compete your UE or JBL.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It's not bad for the novelty of Alexa. Might as well get the echo. Sound it not bad and I'm no audiophile. Might be good when my echo dots come in. Is it worth it? There are better Bluetooth speakers out there.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The Amazon Tap has great sound and is responsive to requests for the songs and music I like. It has a rechargeable battery and is portable which is great for taking your music with you as you move around. Thumbs up for the Tap!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Still in the learning process--looking forward to more benefits!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Alexa {speaking from the Amazon Tap) is great to have around ! Current news, personal planning details as well as details that might have been forgotten are all available from Alexa..... The Tap sits next to my bed on the nite stand where I can easily call up ijnfo from my bed or as I walk by during the day or nite. Especially useful for a review of my calendar so I can review my upcoming days plans. Try Alexa in a store and my guess is you will want her at your house!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I own the Echo, and love the product! So I purchased the Tap as a gift.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We're in our 70s and and have a good time with it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great product for intro to an AI device. Cant wait to upgrade to echo.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: would get another, works great, having fun with all the options

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Hi Everyone, Alexa is the best of the best. I feel like she knows me more and more each week. She is a STRONG speaker for my love of music. She knows like everything ever. I ask her crazy facts and she always responds with something. She does struggle a little with recent events. But that will get better with time. She is my home personal assistant and assists with managing my calendar. In a word. AWESOME!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love everything about it.... it is portable, sounds better than most portable speakers, and Alexa rocks it. Only thing that kept it from a 5 star rating is that you have to manually activate Alexa. Wish it would work like the Echo and Dot, while it is on its base.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I am a huge fan of the echo. That being said this is the last one I would buy. The original echo's speaker sounds much better and is hands free. The dot has great connection Bluetooth and more importantly audio out to plug into a stereo system. I bought this for the purpose of being able to carry outside around the house when working in the yard. The sound is not as robust as the original echo (not portable - no internal battery), but good enough when in the yard to at least have music.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I bring it when hanging out outside, exercising, doing housework anywhere my echo won't hear me

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I like the portability of the tap and the sound is nice. You can set it up to either push the microphone button to activate it or you can set it up like the echo where you just say Alexa.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great item, good service from Best Buy. It is uncanny that new and unique products are introduced often.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We already had an Alexa but this one is a great addition. It's portable, rechargeable and good sound.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I was impressed with the sound of the original Echo, the price of the Dot. The Echo Tap is the best of both and Portable. I have echos in multiple rooms. I got this to bring music outside to the patio. The music has rich bass and clear sound perfect for tunes or talk. Now that SiriusXM is on Alexa too I have access to great music, Howard stern, NFL, MLB and all the rest of the satellite radio content. The great thing about the tap is unlike a normal Bluetooth speaker this one works solo with Alexa and wifi. Even my wife loves it I think she talks to Alexa now more than she talks to me.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We love this speaker for listening to music, the weather, news, or just anything. It is super portable and even has a hands-free option so it is really like a mini Echo!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love my Echo Tap! I have my own personal alarm, informs me on today's weather forcast and local events. Great purchase.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Much more than a Bluetooth speaker. It is great to listen to music from Pandora, Amazon, etc with it streaming directly from wifi. Saves the battery on my phone. As others have said I wish that it had an option of having the voice activation on all times but I guess they didn't put that in to save battery life. Maybe something for the next generation TAp

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: best portable speaker I've ever owned. I use this everyday, mostly when getting ready in the morning or when I have guests over. Good sound quality and links to the Alexa app just like an Echo. It come with a charging base that allows you to not have it plugged in unlike the Echo. Also connects to a mobile device via bluetooth or aux cord.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is such a great product I have two of them! Would highly recommend.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This item was very easy to use from the very beginning and was very responsive to my request and commands. I like the fact that you can also add other items to work with it

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: With this you have someone to talk to and answers you.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Just really thought it would have been more useful without having to have to make additional purchases for music I like.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This speaker is great for the price. I love how the speaker is 360 degrees so you get the same sound in any part of the room.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love this .. Great extra for my amazon echo .. Does everything it does but it's cordless .. Keeps charge for many days .. Push button to activate .. Wireless speaker also out of wifi .. Really cool !!

productName: Kindle Fire HD 7"
review: An Amazon.com official commented on this review(What's this) The Amazon team saysOctober 11, 2013Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We're excited to see your encouraging comments regarding display and sound, and appreciate the thoughtful analysis you did of this device compared to the previous generation Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD. As you correctly point out, the new Kindle Fire HD is the successor to last year's entry level Kindle Fire, which does not include features such as camera, microphone, or HDMI port. You are also correct to point out that this device does not support Mayday, although there are still multiple ways to get help for free directly from your device. We hope you enjoy the new features and services. Thanks, The Kindle Team

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love using this as a speaker for my MacBook. I keep it in my office and use it daily!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It exceeded my expectations and recommend this product to friends

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I absolutely love this speaker. It is easy to use and the app is user friendly. I have used it at the beach, pool, lake, and park I will not travel without it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: From latest news flash, to weather info, to hearing a joke while cooking and waiting for Alexa to set a timer, the Amazon Tap is a fun tool to have around the house!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The tap has pretty good sound for a speaker this size. I also have an Amazon Dot, but would recommend you pay the extra cost and get the Tap to enjoy the better sound. It's worth it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: got as a gift. Might not have got for my self- but love it and glad I had a birthday - lol

review: The latest software update included hands free mode. So this can do everything that the stationary Echo speaker does, but is fully portable. Personally, I don't want the device to record everything I say all the time, so I only use the tap mode. The sound quality is good for a speaker of this size. This is especially a great choice if you have a mobile hotspot with unlimited data. You can now bring Alexa on the go.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love this product. Great sound quality and at a good price

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Amazon Tap is awesome! Very happy with the purchase!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Bought this for our 7 and 5 year old. They love to play music and ask questions about science. Lots of fun!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have owned three versions of the amazon echo: the original, the dot, and the tap. This is the most versatile of the three. The wireless recharging is great. The sound is not as good as the original, but the portability makes up for this. At $79 it was a fantastic buy.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: WAS SURPRISED HOW GREAT THIS WORKS , MUSIC ASK IT QUESTIONS AWESOME

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I live in a small apartment and this fan kept the whole place cool.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The sound in this is on par with other high end portable speakers. That however is really just the tip of the iceberg. If you have amazon prime you can access all your music just by asking. Also this works if you have Phillips hue so you can turn the lights off and on with your voice.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Amazon has been the leader in this space of voice recognition and with the AWS engine behind it, there's a lot of opportunity for development, both from the community as well as Amazon. Naturally they favor interaction with services they sell, so others will need to build links to others, but the development environment seems to support a lot of innovation already. The price of this TAP was outstanding, adding it to my existing ECHO and now considering a DOT.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I like it. I use it everyday and so far no cons. Im very please.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love this product and that you can take "Alexa" everywhere with you because it is a portable speaker. You can connect it to your phone when away from a WiFi building. The speaker is great, it is surrounded by cloth, which I would worry about it getting dirty. The one downside to the tap compared to the Echo Dot or the OG Echo is that Alexa is not always listening and for her to work on the Tap, you have to press the speaker button. Pretty self explanatory name. You have to "tap" the tap. I ended up returning it to get the dot. But, like I said, great speaker, great portable device.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This product works great as a little helper and as a great speaker for music. I purchased this for my mother in a nursing home, she loves it! It is very easy to set up and use.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Haven't been able to train Alexa like we've heard. Probably our own fault. We have fun with it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: When it works it's great but for some reason it doesn't always answer me When it doesn't answer me I turn off the tv and make sure no one else is talking and it still doesn't work at that time. It was easy to set up with the phone app. Doesn't seem to matter where the phone is when it isn't working. I've tried close and far and in between. So a case of great when it works and the pits when it doesn't

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Nice price for a gift idea at the time. Small compact version of Alexa.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Fantastic sound from such a small speaker, excellent! Not as impressed with its other potential capabilities- more difficult to set those up & get all the various apps needed to do things like get weather, order items, etc.. Wish it came with more pre installed I guess.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have the Amazon dot, which is great. But after purchasing the tap, which was on sale too, I was sold. You can take it any where. And the sound is great!!!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I do like the portability of my Tap. You do lose some features from the Echo - like speaking to it from across the room. But i'm happy with it and it has good sound. great to take out by the pool!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

Also, I thought it would be more like Siri where you can ask anything. Alexa's answer to most questions is, "I don't understand the question." The Bluetooth speaker works fine.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We now have one for everyone in the family and no longer share. I would have no problem recommending this to a friend.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Camera was perfect for my daughter... she's in yearbook at school and fell in love with it...

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We have had the full-size Echo for over a year, and I love it. The Tap requires you to push the button before Alexa responds to your requests, so that takes a little getting used to after using the big Echo's voice activated requests. The Tap speaker is not as good as the big Echo, but it is a nice portable blue tooth speaker that holds a battery charge. Overall, I really like this...and I found it at best buy for $78!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: good speaker. 8 hour battery. Good price. Excellent quality in how it is made.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Using it in the kitchen mainly. It has good sound, works excellent as a cooking timer. Also alarm for certain events thruout the day. Nice music source.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Works great, sound is clear and is really loud. Would recommend

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Very happy with the Tap. We have the Echo and would have to unplug it and plug it in to use it on the deck. With the Tap we just take it off the charging stand and go. No more bothering with Bluetooth speakers and using our phone when we can just play music ever from the Internet with TAP.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is a very nice addition to the alexa family pf products. It is wireless so you can move it around to house wherever you want to listen to music at without having to search for plugs. Great sound and portability.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: What I like is it its sound, it's portable and I use it at work. The sound fills the whole office.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Took awhile to get connected to my home wifi but now that it is it streams flawlessly with no lags in music. Doesn't have the dynamic sound range as other Bluetooth speakers i own.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: We love that it is portable and can move from room to room effortlessly.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Full disclosure. I own five Amazon echos including a few Dots as well as this Tap, so obviously I'm a fan of echoes. Honestly I couldn't figure out from Amazons marketing and the online review how the Tap fit in as compared to full blown Echo and the Dot. I kept thinking it was limited compared to the Echo and the Dot because you had to Tap the button to ask it question. However given that it's completely portable and runs for up to six hours on a charge it makes sense that it would wast battery if it was always listening for a voice command. IMO, the Tap sounds just as good and maybe even better the the Echo in a much smaller form factor. Since it's portable it's probably going to be sitting next to you any way so tapping to ask a question is not really an issue and in someways is better when you have a full table as you can control who gets to request music. My friends and I get into fun wars asking for different music on the full blown Echo but it can also get a little annoying when someone plays Michael Bolton over my Bruce Springsteen. Bottom line just as good of sound as the full blown Tap in a portable and smaller form. Very Happy with all my echoes but this may be my favorite.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Serves my needs as required. Sound is good. Ability to move device where required is ideal

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: ..exactly what I wanted, but the battery drains FAST when on hands free mode.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I like buying things that work as advertised. This does.Although it does not respond as well to my wife's commands. Hmmm...

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This is my second Echo purchase. My first was the original Echo for my home and the automation feature aside. The sound is excellent, Alexa's response is better than any digital assistant to date, and the ready access to Prime is convenient. This is all of that and portable and rechargeable as well. Additionally the inclusion of Bluetooth and a headphone jack is amazing.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Great Bluetooth speaker with the added benefit of Alexa

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: sound is greatdifficult to connect with hotel wifi'sseems durable

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Amazon Tap.. got it on Black Friday sale.. But so far feel not as easy as I think to use.. But if you just use as Bluetooth speaker and sound is good.. Maybe just have to learn how to use it more..

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I wanted to buy a Tap when it was first released. I have several Echo's in the house, but having a portable Alexa enabled device is awesome. Unfortunately, when it was first released, the tap could not be operated hands-free. I held off purchasing one because I was afraid Amazon would wait for new hardware to add that feature.Earlier this year Amazon enabled hands-free mode, and it works almost as well as the Echo, despite having fewer microphones.Sound quality is very good. It's a small speaker but very capable. Battery life is excellent. This is currently the most flexible implementation of Alexa and I recommend it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The Amazon Tap has great sound and plays most of my requests. Easy to use and easy to set up.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I wouldn't buy it again...the software doesn't seem as well integrated with the hardware on this machine. I also have an Echo and I don't have the same connectivity issues with it that I do with this. I liked the features available with this...portability mainly with a long battery life, but with plagued by connectivity issues I can't say I would recommend it. I have looked at reviews online since purchasing and have discovered I am not the only one that feels this way. The sound, when it is connected and responding, is amazing.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: It's pretty cool. Integration with Amazon Music via the mobile phone interface is a little iffy which is odd given both products come from the same company.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The sound out of this little cylinder is incredible.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: The more I use this, the more reasons I enjoy it. The staff were great and helped me set it up.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I bought this as a gift for my father. He absolutely loves it!!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

Still great to be able to take this around the house vs Echo which is tied to the plug.

Easy to move around in and out of the house. Will work anywhere you have WIFI. If you have the tap you may not have a need to invest in the more expensive Echo.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I love this product , so nice to have for trips!!!

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: Bought it as a gift, she loves it. Very entertaining and wonderful volume, having lots of fun with it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I have the Amazon Tap (which I purchased at Best Buy about a month ago) and love it so much I bought one for my son and his family. They love it, too!

review: I got the wrong one, plain and simple. It does what it says, and I like the connection to the internet to play music, but I should have gotten the Echo, I get annoyed at having to go to it and push the button.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: So far we are very much enjoying the product. Great for outdoor use by the pool due to its portability. We have not had a chance to really test how long it can go without a charge but a couple hours has been no problem. Only catch is that you cannot stream a single Spotify account on more than one device at the same time, so if you find yourself purchasing the Dot or Echo you will not be able to stream using the same account at the same time.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: This has been a very nice addition, it allows the whole family to use and enjoy it.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I was looking for a blutooth speaker to use with my phone but I didn't want to worry about things being ordered on my amazon account or the whole dreaded electronic eavsdropping that has been in the news the last few months. This speaker fits the bill as you can disable order by Alexa, and you have to manually push the listen button for the mic to pick up sound. The speaker quality is great for a portable option. The only thing that I don't like is the charging stand can lose connection if its not sitting just right, but I can't knock a star for this as they allow you to plug the cable directly into the unit itself which solves the problem.

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
review: I would recommend this Prouducts it had great full sound full sound with a conpack

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker

productName: Amazon Tap - Alexa-Enabled Portable Bluetooth Speaker
